page.title: 08SHANGRI-LA CARAVAN PARK
page.content: Mr D Hiller likes the caravan park because it is open.He says that there are not many entertainments in the evening.He says there is a fishing lake,amusement park and twice a week there is live entertainment.The rates people have to pay is Â£420 pounds for the year.Mr Hiller says that the caravan site has been open for 25years and most of the people have been coming for at least 20years.He says he mainly gets retired people.They enjoy it because it is peacful and away from traffic.All the people in the caravan park are very friendly and interesting.Mr Hiller says that there are at least 400 people that come to the caravan park and the number increases each year.
